translation.text: CONSTRUCTION

PARKING_ISSUE

MAINTENANCE

The escalator will remain out of service for the foreseeable future. This decision was made after a thorough inspection determined that corrosion on the escalator’s steel truss was so severe that it could not be repaired further and that a complete replacement of the escalator would be required. Replacing the escalator at this location requires a more extended unit meeting modern escalator safety requirements. This longer unit will require significant alteration to the station entrance to meet code requirements. The MBTA has currently begun design work to understand what station upgrades will be needed. 
  
Due to these complexities, we expect the escalator will remain out of service for a significant time. We recognize the challenges this poses to our riders, and please know we are working to identify a solution as quickly as possible. In the meantime, Government Center Station, which is fully accessible and serves the Blue Line, is under a quarter-mile from Bowdoin Station.
ESCALATOR_CLOSURE
Bowdoin Escalator 125 (Lobby to street) is unavailable until further notice pending replacement.

UNKNOWN_CAUSE

Built in 1906, the South Elm Bridge is beyond its useful life and ready to be replaced. Using accelerated bridge construction techniques to reduce customer and traffic impacts, the MBTA will replace the nearly-120-year-old bridge with a modern single-span structure with a useful life of 75 years. The new structure will include a ballasted steel deck, which means a smoother ride for passengers. The MBTA will also perform roadway, sidewalk, and drainage improvements along South Elm Street.
STATION_CLOSURE
Commuter Rail train service is suspended at Haverhill station through Summer 2025 to allow for work on the South Elm Street Bridge. An accessible van operates between Haverhill and Bradford.

El servicio de tren Commuter Rail se suspende en la estación Haverhill a través del verano 2025 para permitir el trabajo en el puente de la calle South Elm. Una camioneta accesible opera entre Haverhill y Bradford.
O serviço de trem Commuter Rail é suspenso na estação Haverhill através do verão 2025 para permitir o trabalho na ponte South Elm Street. Uma van acessível opera entre Haverhill e Bradford.

SERVICE_CHANGE

Effective Monday, Sept 9th & for approximately 7 weeks, the high-level platform on the outbound side of Attleboro station is closed for renovation. Please board trains at the north end of the platform. A portable lift will be available on the platform.

A partir del lunes 9 de septiembre, aproximadamente 7 semanas, la plataforma de alto nivel en el lado exterior de la estación de Attleboro está cerrada para su renovación. Por favor, abordar trenes en el extremo norte de la plataforma. Un ascensor portátil estará disponible en la plataforma.

Segunda-feira efetiva, 9 de setembro & por aproximadamente 7 semanas, a plataforma de alto nível no lado exterior da estação Attleboro está fechada para renovação. Por favor, embarque em trens no extremo norte da plataforma. Um elevador portátil estará disponível na plataforma.
从9月9日周一开始,Attleboro站外侧的高级站台关闭,进行翻修,为期约7周。 请在月台北端登上列车. 站台上将设有便携式升降机.

North Quincy Newport Avenue Parking Lot closed beginning Wed Oct 16 due to construction. The vehicle entrance and exit will relocate to the old “state street” driveway. Public access via stairs/escalators to the lobby is restricted. Elevator access only.

- A diversion schedule will be in effect.

-There will be a local bus making all stops between North Station and Reading. 

- Buses will also provide service between Reading and Anderson/Woburn to connect with Haverhill Line or Lowell Line trains.

- While shuttle buses are running between Reading and North Station, passengers between Reading and Malden Center may also consider MBTA Bus #137, which will be fare-free during this outage, as an alternative option.

- There will be no bus or train service at North Wilmington Station. Passengers will be advised to consider a connection with the Lowell Line at Wilmington station (1.9 miles of distance).

 - This allows for work in support of MassDOT’s Maffa Way/Mystic Avenue Bridge Superstructure Replacement project.

Here is a list of the shuttle bus locations:

North Station:
Nashua Street, at the Western side of North Station. If you are traveling to Malden Center or Oak Grove, there is also an Orange Line shuttle bus available on
SERVICE_CHANGE

On the weekends of Feb 1-2, Feb 15-16 & Mar 8-9, buses will replace train service between Reading & North Station on the Haverhill Line. Trains will make all stops between Haverhill & Ballardvale and stop at Anderson/Woburn on the Lowell Line.

Los fines de semana del 1 de febrero del 15 al 16 de febrero del 8 al 9 de marzo, los autobuses sustituirán el servicio de tren entre Reading & North Station en la Línea Haverhill. Los trenes harán todas las paradas entre Haverhill & Ballardvale y pararán en Anderson/Woburn en la Línea Lowell.

Nos fins de semana de Fev 1-2, Fev 15-16 & Mar 8-9, os ônibus substituirão o serviço de trem entre Reading & North Station na linha Haverhill. Os trens farão todas as paradas entre Haverhill & Ballardvale e param em Anderson/Woburn na linha Lowell.
2月1日至2日,2月15日至16日及Mar 8-9日的周末,巴士将取代哈弗希尔线的Reading & North Station之间的列车服务. 列车将在哈弗希尔和巴拉德瓦莱之间全部停靠,并在卢瓦尔线的安德森/沃本停靠.
A diagram of the Haverhill shuttle bus diversion taking place on the weekends of Jan 18-19, Feb 1-2, Feb 15-16 & Mar 8-9.
https://cdn.mbta.com/sites/default/files/media/route_pdfs/2025-01-18-cr-haverhill-line-weekend-shuttle-schedule.pdf
UNKNOWN_CAUSE

- A diversion schedule will be in effect.

- Express service will operate between Swampscott and North Station. 

- Local service will make an extra stop at Wonderland Station for a Blue Line connection. 

- Passengers at Chelsea may also consider a Silver Line SL3 connection. 

- This allows for work in support of MassDOT’s Maffa Way/Mystic Avenue Bridge Superstructure Replacement project.

Here is a list of the shuttle bus locations:

North Station:
Nashua Street on the Southern side of the station.

Chelsea:
On Everrett Avenue by Vale Street, North of the station.

Wonderland:
At the station busway, Berth E.

Lynn:
At the Lynn Station busway, 325 Broad Street, Berth 1. There will be no service at Lynn Interim Station, passengers must make their way to the old station's busway.

Swampscott:
On Railroad Avenue, just South of the station.
SERVICE_CHANGE

On the weekends of Feb 1-2, Feb 15-16 & Mar 8-9, express and local shuttle buses will replace regular train service between Swampscott and North Station on the Newburyport/Rockport Line to allow for bridge replacement work.

Los fines de semana del 1 al 2 de febrero, 15 al 16 de febrero, los autobuses expresos y locales de transporte reemplazarán el servicio regular de tren entre Swampscott y North Station en Newburyport/Rockport Line para permitir el trabajo de reemplazo de puentes.

Nos fins de semana de Fev 1-2, Fev 15-16 & Mar 8-9, ônibus expressos e locais de transporte substituirão o serviço de trem regular entre Swampscott e North Station na linha Newburyport/Rockport para permitir trabalhos de substituição de ponte.
2月1日至2日,2月15日至16日及3月8日至9日的周末,特快车和当地的穿梭巴士将取代纽伯里港/洛克波特线的斯旺普斯科特至北站之间的定期列车服务,以便进行桥面替换工程.
A diagram of the shuttle bus diversion taking place on the weekends of Jan 18-19, Feb 1-2, Feb 15-16 & Mar 8-9.
https://cdn.mbta.com/sites/default/files/media/route_pdfs/2025-01-18-newbury-rockport-weekend-shuttle-schedule.pdf
CONSTRUCTION
PARKING_ISSUE

The Oak Grove Station Parking Lot has reduced availability through Monday, Mar 31, 2025, due to construction. Alternative parking is available at Wellington and/or Station Landing Garage (levels 6-8).

橡树园车站 由于施工,洛特在2025年3月31日星期一之前已经减少了供应. 惠灵顿和/或车站停靠停车场(6-8级)可提供替代停车位.

Accessibility: 
Accessible van service will be available for Green Line stops between Copley/Back Bay and North Station.

Bus Alternatives:
Route 39 Bus will be free to ride between Heath Street and Copley/Back Bay. This route runs parallel to the Green Line E Branch 

Route 57 Bus will be free to ride between Packard’s Corner and Kenmore. 

Commuter Rail Alternatives:
Commuter Rail Worcester Line will be free to ride between Lansdowne, Back Bay, and South Station

Affected Stops, Alternate Service, and Shuttle Locations:
North Station (Transfer within Station to Orange Line) 
Haymarket (Transfer within Station to Orange Line.) 
Government Center (use State, 0.2 mi.) 
Park Street (use Downtown Crossing, 0.2 mi.) 
Boylston (use Chinatown, 0.1 mi.) 
Arlington (use Chinatown, 0.4 mi.) 

Copley (use Back Bay, 0.2 mi.)

Eastbound Shuttle Stop  - 360 Commonwealth Ave
SUSPENSION

Green Line: No trains between North Station & Babcock St (B), Kenmore (C+D), & Heath St (E), Feb. 22-23, due to maintenance. Use buses between Babcock, Kenmore, Heath St (Rt 39) & Copley/Back Bay. Use Orange Line between Back Bay & North Station.

Línea Verde: No hay trenes entre North Station & Babcock St (B), Kenmore (C+D), " Heath St (E), 22-23 de febrero, debido al mantenimiento. Utilice autobuses entre Babcock, Kenmore, Heath St (Rt 39) & Copley/Back Bay. Use Orange Line entre Back Bay y North Station.

Linha verde: Sem trens entre North Station & Babcock St (B), Kenmore (C+D), & Heath St (E), 22-23 de fevereiro, devido à manutenção. Use ônibus entre Babcock, Kenmore, Heath St (Rt 39) & Copley/Back Bay. Use Orange Line entre Back Bay e North Station.
绿线 : 北站与巴布科克街(B),肯莫尔街(C+D),和海思街(E)之间没有列车,2月22-23日,由于维护原因. 使用巴布科克,肯莫尔,海斯圣(Rt 39)和科普利/巴克湾之间的巴士. 在后湾站和北站之间使用橙线.
http://www.mbta.com/greenline

MAINTENANCE

Riders are strongly encouraged to use the Middleborough, Kington, and Greenbush Commuter Rail lines for fare-free service between Braintree, Quincy Center, JFK/UMass, and South Station. Commuter Rail schedules are available on mbta.com. Regular Commuter Rail fares will be collected for travel beyond Braintree.

Shuttle Locations:

JFK/UMass:
JFK/UMass Station Busway

North Quincy:
Northbound & Southbound 263 Hancock St (North Quincy Station)

Wollaston:
Northbound- Newport Ave (Newport Ave @ Brook St)
Southbound- 291 Newport Ave (Newport Ave @ Brook St)

Quincy Center:
Northbound- Burgin Pkwy @ Quincy Center Station
Southbound- 1250 Hancock St (Quincy Center Station)

Quincy Adams:
Northbound & Southbound - Quincy Adams Station

Braintree:
Northbound- Braintree Station Busway
SHUTTLE

Red Line: Shuttle buses will replace service between JFK/UMass and Braintree, the weekends of Feb 8 - 9, and Feb 22 - 23, for signal upgrades. Commuter Rail service between Braintree and South Station will be fare-free during this work.

Red Line: Los autobuses de transbordador reemplazarán el servicio entre JFK/UMass y Braintree, los fines de semana del 8 al 9 de febrero y el 22 al 23 de febrero, para las actualizaciones de señales. El servicio Commuter Rail entre Braintree y South Station estará libre de tarifas durante este trabajo.

Linha Vermelha: Os ônibus de transporte substituirão o serviço entre JFK/UMass e Braintree, os fins de semana de Fev 8 - 9, e Fev 22 - 23, para atualizações de sinal. O serviço Commuter Rail entre Braintree e South Station será gratuito durante este trabalho.
红线:客车将取代JFK/UMass和Braintree之间的服务,2月8日至9日和2月22日至23日的周末用于信号升级. 在这项工作中,Braintree和南站之间的通勤铁路服务将免费.
Graphic of the shuttle stops for the Red Line closure

MAINTENANCE

To exit, use North Quincy Elevator 900 to access the main lobby at West Squantum St. Upon exiting the main lobby, turn right onto West Squantum St, then turn right on the ramp to Newport Ave Extension. Continue for approx. 900 feet to the Newport Ave parking lot entrance. To board, exit the Newport Ave parking lot, turn left and travel approx. 900 ft. along Newport Ave Extension and up the ramp to West Squantum St. At West Squantum St, turn left and continue to the North Quincy main entrance and use North Quincy Elevator 900. See station personnel or use a station call box to request assistance.

Red Line Braintree Branch: All train service at Quincy Center and Quincy Adams will operate on a single track, from 8:00 PM to the end of service, through Friday, February 7, for signal work. Riders may experience longer wait times during this work.

Red Line Braintree Subdivisión: Todo el servicio de tren en Quincy Center y Quincy Adams funcionará en una sola pista, de 8:00 PM al final del servicio, hasta el viernes 7 de febrero para el trabajo de señalización. Los corredores pueden experimentar tiempos de espera más largos durante este trabajo.

Linha vermelha do cérebro Ramo: Todos os serviços de trem no Quincy Center e Quincy Adams irão operar em uma única faixa, das 8:00 até o final do serviço, até sexta-feira, 7 de fevereiro para o trabalho de sinal. Os pilotos podem experimentar tempos de espera mais longos durante este trabalho.
